name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Remote Sensing Engineer with 8 years of experience in **Python**, **AWS**, **Linux**, and advanced data analysis techniques. I specialize in machine learning and deep learning, utilizing **Databricks** for effective data processing and analysis across various projects. My expertise in algorithm development and validation ensures accurate and reliable results in remote sensing applications.

Proficient in radiometry and radiative transfer principles, I leverage data from numerical weather prediction (NWP) models to inform project strategies. I possess a strong ability to calibrate and cross-calibrate complex systems, ensuring compliance with industry standards. My collaborative approach fosters teamwork, and I excel in communication with cross-functional teams. I have successfully led initiatives that integrate cutting-edge technologies into strategic solutions while maintaining a strong focus on continuous improvement and innovation.
